casebody.data:
Union Indemity Company et al, Plaintiff in Error, v. City of New Smyrna, For the Use and Benefit of J. P. Davis, Defendant in Error. Opinion filed December 22, 1928. Robert II. Anderson, for Plaintiff in Error; George I. Fullerton and Stewart & Stewart, for defendant in error.

En Banc.

Petition for rehearing denied January 18, 1929.
